verses.verse: <S%H6213><s%>"'You shall make for yourselves no <S%H457>idols,<s%> neither shall you raise <S%H6965>up<s%> an engraved <S%H6459>image<s%> or a <S%H4676>pillar,<s%> neither shall you <S%H5414>place<s%> any <S%H4906>figured<s%> <S%H68>stone<s%> in your <S%H776>land,<s%> to bow <S%H7812>down<s%> to <S%H3068>it:<s%> for I am Yahweh your <S%H430>God.<s%>
<S%H8104><s%>"'You shall keep my <S%H7676>Sabbaths,<s%> and have <S%H3372>reverence<s%> for my <S%H4720>sanctuary.<s%> I am <S%H3068>Yahweh.<s%>
<S%H3212><s%>"'If you walk in my <S%H2708>statutes,<s%> and <S%H8104>keep<s%> my <S%H4687>commandments,<s%> and do <S%H6213>them;<s%>

then I will <S%H5414>give<s%> you your <S%H1653>rains<s%> in their <S%H6256>season,<s%> and the <S%H776>land<s%> shall <S%H5414>yield<s%> its <S%H2981>increase,<s%> and the <S%H6086>trees<s%> of the <S%H7704>field<s%> shall <S%H5414>yield<s%> their <S%H6529>fruit.<s%>

Your <S%H1786>threshing<s%> shall <S%H5381>reach<s%> to the <S%H1210>vintage,<s%> and the <S%H1210>vintage<s%> shall <S%H5381>reach<s%> to the sowing <S%H2233>time;<s%> and you shall <S%H398>eat<s%> your <S%H3899>bread<s%> to the <S%H7648>full,<s%> and <S%H3427>dwell<s%> in your <S%H776>land<s%> <S%H983>safely.<s%>

<S%H5414><s%>"'I will give <S%H7965>peace<s%> in the <S%H776>land,<s%> and you shall lie <S%H7901>down,<s%> and no one will make you <S%H2729>afraid;<s%> and I will <S%H7673>remove<s%> <S%H7451>evil<s%> <S%H2416>animals<s%> out of the <S%H776>land,<s%> neither shall the <S%H2719>sword<s%> <S%H5674>go<s%> through your <S%H776>land.<s%>
You shall <S%H7291>chase<s%> your <S%H341>enemies,<s%> and they shall <S%H5307>fall<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> you by the <S%H2719>sword.<s%>

<S%H2568>Five<s%> of you shall <S%H7291>chase<s%> a <S%H3967>hundred,<s%> and a <S%H3967>hundred<s%> of you shall <S%H7291>chase<s%> ten <S%H7233>thousand;<s%> and your <S%H341>enemies<s%> shall <S%H5307>fall<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> you by the <S%H2719>sword.<s%>
<S%H6437><s%>"'I will have respect for <S%H6509>you,<s%> and make you fruitful, and <S%H7235>multiply<s%> <S%H6965>you,<s%> and will establish my covenant with <S%H1285>you.<s%>
You shall <S%H398>eat<s%> old <S%H3462>store<s%> long <S%H3318>kept,<s%> and you shall move out the <S%H3465>old<s%> <S%H6440>because<s%> of the <S%H2319>new.<s%>
I will <S%H5414>set<s%> my <S%H4908>tent<s%> <S%H8432>among<s%> <S%H5315>you:<s%> and my soul <S%H1602>won't<s%> abhor you.
I will <S%H1980>walk<s%> <S%H8432>among<s%> <S%H1961>you,<s%> and will be your <S%H430>God,<s%> and you will <S%H1961>be<s%> my <S%H5971>people.<s%>

I am <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> your <S%H430>God,<s%> who brought you <S%H3318>forth<s%> <S%H3318>out<s%> of the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt,<s%> that you should not be their <S%H5650>slaves;<s%> and I have <S%H7665>broken<s%> the bars of your <S%H5923>yoke,<s%> and made you <S%H3212>go<s%> <S%H6968>upright.<s%>
<S%H8085><s%>"'But if you will not listen to <S%H6213>me,<s%> and will not do all these <S%H4687>commandments;<s%>

and if you shall <S%H3988>reject<s%> my <S%H2708>statutes,<s%> and if your <S%H5315>soul<s%> <S%H1602>abhors<s%> my <S%H4941>ordinances,<s%> so that you will not <S%H6213>do<s%> all my <S%H4687>commandments,<s%> but <S%H6565>break<s%> my <S%H1285>covenant;<s%>

I also will <S%H6213>do<s%> this to <S%H6485>you:<s%> I will appoint <S%H928>terror<s%> over <S%H7829>you,<s%> even consumption and <S%H6920>fever,<s%> that shall <S%H3615>consume<s%> the <S%H5869>eyes,<s%> and make the <S%H5315>soul<s%> to <S%H1727>pine<s%> <S%H2232>away;<s%> and you will sow your <S%H2233>seed<s%> in <S%H7385>vain,<s%> for your <S%H341>enemies<s%> will eat <S%H398>it.<s%>

I will <S%H5414>set<s%> my <S%H6440>face<s%> against <S%H5062>you,<s%> and you will be struck <S%H6440>before<s%> your <S%H341>enemies.<s%> Those who <S%H8130>hate<s%> you will <S%H7287>rule<s%> over <S%H5127>you;<s%> and you will flee when no one pursues <S%H7291>you.<s%>
<S%H5704><s%>"'If you in spite of these things will not <S%H8085>listen<s%> to <S%H3256>me,<s%> then I will chastise you seven <S%H7651>times<s%> <S%H3254>more<s%> for your <S%H2403>sins.<s%>

I will <S%H7665>break<s%> the <S%H1347>pride<s%> of your <S%H5797>power,<s%> and I will <S%H5414>make<s%> your <S%H8064>sky<s%> like <S%H1270>iron,<s%> and your <S%H776>soil<s%> like <S%H5154>brass;<s%>

and your <S%H3581>strength<s%> will be <S%H8552>spent<s%> in <S%H7385>vain;<s%> for your <S%H776>land<s%> <S%H5414>won't<s%> yield its <S%H2981>increase,<s%> neither will the <S%H6086>trees<s%> of the <S%H776>land<s%> <S%H5414>yield<s%> their <S%H6529>fruit.<s%>

<S%H3212><s%>"'If you walk <S%H7147>contrary<s%> to <S%H8085>me,<s%> and won't listen to <S%H14>me,<s%> then I will <S%H3254>bring<s%> seven <S%H7651>times<s%> <S%H3254>more<s%> <S%H4347>plagues<s%> on you according to your <S%H2403>sins.<s%>

I will <S%H7971>send<s%> the <S%H7704>wild<s%> <S%H2416>animals<s%> among <S%H7921>you,<s%> which will rob you of your children, <S%H3772>destroy<s%> your <S%H929>livestock,<s%> and make you few in <S%H4591>number;<s%> and your <S%H1870>roads<s%> will become <S%H8074>desolate.<s%>
<S%H3256><s%>"'If by these things you won't be reformed to <S%H1980>me,<s%> but will walk contrary to <S%H7147>me;<s%>
then I will also <S%H1980>walk<s%> <S%H7147>contrary<s%> to <S%H5221>you;<s%> and I will strike <S%H1571>you,<s%> even <S%H7651>I,<s%> seven times for your <S%H2403>sins.<s%>

I will <S%H935>bring<s%> a <S%H2719>sword<s%> upon <S%H5359>you,<s%> that will execute the <S%H5358>vengeance<s%> of the <S%H1285>covenant;<s%> and you will be gathered <S%H622>together<s%> <S%H413>within<s%> your <S%H5892>cities:<s%> and I will <S%H7971>send<s%> the <S%H1698>pestilence<s%> <S%H8432>among<s%> <S%H5414>you;<s%> and you will be delivered into the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of the <S%H341>enemy.<s%>

When I <S%H7665>break<s%> your <S%H4294>staff<s%> of <S%H3899>bread,<s%> <S%H6235>ten<s%> <S%H802>women<s%> shall <S%H644>bake<s%> your <S%H3899>bread<s%> in <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H8574>oven,<s%> and they shall <S%H7725>deliver<s%> your <S%H3899>bread<s%> <S%H7725>again<s%> by <S%H4948>weight:<s%> and you shall <S%H398>eat,<s%> and not be <S%H7646>satisfied.<s%>
<S%H2063><s%>"'If you in spite of this <S%H8085>won't<s%> listen to <S%H1980>me,<s%> but walk contrary to <S%H7147>me;<s%>
then I will <S%H1980>walk<s%> <S%H7147>contrary<s%> to you in <S%H2534>wrath;<s%> and I <S%H637>also<s%> will <S%H3256>chastise<s%> you seven <S%H7651>times<s%> for your <S%H2403>sins.<s%>
You will <S%H398>eat<s%> the <S%H1320>flesh<s%> of your <S%H1121>sons,<s%> and you will <S%H398>eat<s%> the <S%H1320>flesh<s%> of your <S%H1323>daughters.<s%>

I will <S%H8045>destroy<s%> your high <S%H1116>places,<s%> and cut <S%H3772>down<s%> your incense <S%H2553>altars,<s%> and <S%H5414>cast<s%> your dead <S%H6297>bodies<s%> upon the <S%H6297>bodies<s%> of your <S%H1544>idols;<s%> and my <S%H5315>soul<s%> will abhor <S%H1602>you.<s%>

I will <S%H5414>lay<s%> your <S%H5892>cities<s%> <S%H2723>waste,<s%> and will <S%H8074>bring<s%> your <S%H4720>sanctuaries<s%> to <S%H8074>desolation,<s%> and I will not take <S%H7306>delight<s%> in the sweet <S%H7381>fragrance<s%> of your <S%H5207>offerings.<s%>
I will <S%H8074>bring<s%> the <S%H776>land<s%> into <S%H8074>desolation;<s%> and your <S%H341>enemies<s%> that <S%H3427>dwell<s%> therein will be astonished at <S%H8074>it.<s%>

I will <S%H2219>scatter<s%> you among the <S%H1471>nations,<s%> and I will draw <S%H7324>out<s%> the <S%H2719>sword<s%> <S%H310>after<s%> <S%H776>you:<s%> and your land will be a <S%H8077>desolation,<s%> and your <S%H5892>cities<s%> shall be a <S%H2723>waste.<s%>

Then the <S%H776>land<s%> will <S%H7521>enjoy<s%> its <S%H7676>sabbaths<s%> as <S%H3117>long<s%> as it lies <S%H8074>desolate<s%> and you are in your <S%H341>enemies<s%>' <S%H776>land.<s%> Even then the <S%H776>land<s%> will <S%H7673>rest<s%> and <S%H7521>enjoy<s%> its <S%H7676>sabbaths.<s%>

As long <S%H3117>as<s%> it lies <S%H8074>desolate<s%> it shall have <S%H7673>rest,<s%> even the <S%H7673>rest<s%> which it <S%H7676>didn't<s%> have in your sabbaths, when you lived on <S%H3427>it.<s%>

<S%H7604><s%>"'As for those of you who are left, I will <S%H935>send<s%> a <S%H4816>faintness<s%> into their <S%H3824>hearts<s%> in the <S%H776>lands<s%> of their <S%H341>enemies:<s%> and the <S%H6963>sound<s%> of a <S%H5086>driven<s%> <S%H5929>leaf<s%> will put them to <S%H7291>flight;<s%> and they shall <S%H5127>flee,<s%> as one <S%H5127>flees<s%> from the <S%H2719>sword;<s%> and they will <S%H5307>fall<s%> when no one <S%H7291>pursues.<s%>

They will <S%H3782>stumble<s%> over <S%H376>one<s%> <S%H251>another,<s%> as it were <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H2719>sword,<s%> when no one <S%H7291>pursues:<s%> and you will have no power to <S%H8617>stand<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> your <S%H341>enemies.<s%>
You will <S%H6>perish<s%> among the <S%H1471>nations,<s%> and the <S%H776>land<s%> of your <S%H341>enemies<s%> will eat you <S%H398>up.<s%>

Those of you who are <S%H7604>left<s%> will pine <S%H4743>away<s%> in their <S%H5771>iniquity<s%> in your <S%H341>enemies<s%>' <S%H776>lands;<s%> and also in the <S%H5771>iniquities<s%> of their <S%H1>fathers<s%> shall they pine away with <S%H4743>them.<s%>

<S%H3034><s%>"'If they confess their <S%H5771>iniquity,<s%> and the <S%H5771>iniquity<s%> of their <S%H1>fathers,<s%> in their <S%H4604>trespass<s%> which they <S%H4603>trespassed<s%> against <S%H1980>me,<s%> and also that, because they walked contrary to <S%H7147>me,<s%>

I also <S%H3212>walked<s%> <S%H7147>contrary<s%> to <S%H935>them,<s%> and brought them into the <S%H776>land<s%> of their <S%H341>enemies:<s%> if <S%H176>then<s%> their <S%H6189>uncircumcised<s%> <S%H3824>heart<s%> is <S%H3665>humbled,<s%> and they then <S%H7521>accept<s%> the punishment of their <S%H5771>iniquity;<s%>

then I will <S%H2142>remember<s%> my <S%H1285>covenant<s%> with <S%H3290>Jacob;<s%> and also my <S%H1285>covenant<s%> with <S%H3327>Isaac,<s%> and also my <S%H1285>covenant<s%> with <S%H85>Abraham;<s%> and I will <S%H2142>remember<s%> the <S%H776>land.<s%>

The <S%H776>land<s%> also will be <S%H5800>left<s%> by <S%H7521>them,<s%> and will enjoy its <S%H7676>sabbaths<s%> while it lies <S%H8074>desolate<s%> without <S%H7521>them:<s%> and they will accept the punishment of their <S%H5771>iniquity;<s%> <S%H3282>because,<s%> even <S%H3282>because<s%> they <S%H3988>rejected<s%> my <S%H4941>ordinances,<s%> and their <S%H5315>soul<s%> <S%H1602>abhorred<s%> my <S%H2708>statutes.<s%>

<S%H637>Yet<s%> for all <S%H2063>that,<s%> when they <S%H1571>are<s%> in the <S%H776>land<s%> of their <S%H341>enemies,<s%> I will not <S%H3988>reject<s%> <S%H1602>them,<s%> neither will I abhor <S%H3615>them,<s%> to destroy them utterly, and to <S%H6565>break<s%> my <S%H1285>covenant<s%> with <S%H3068>them;<s%> for I am Yahweh their <S%H430>God;<s%>

but I will for their sake <S%H2142>remember<s%> the <S%H1285>covenant<s%> of their <S%H7223>ancestors,<s%> whom I brought <S%H3318>out<s%> of the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt<s%> in the <S%H5869>sight<s%> of the <S%H1471>nations,<s%> that I might be their <S%H430>God.<s%> I am <S%H3068>Yahweh.<s%>'"

These are the <S%H2706>statutes,<s%> <S%H4941>ordinances<s%> and <S%H8451>laws,<s%> which <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> <S%H5414>made<s%> between him and the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> in <S%H2022>Mount<s%> <S%H5514>Sinai<s%> <S%H3027>by<s%> <S%H4872>Moses.<s%>
